0032759110.details: 1 short cadence sector (6); tess-ebs morph 0.128 & period ~4.077 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.226; SpT M4.5Ve; eclipses of ~0.17 & ~0.15 mag, some noise & flares;
0032759110.notes: flattening of LC gives more durable fit; in the 2021ApJ...912..123J catalogue;

0037606218.details: 2 short cadence sectors (6 & 87); tess-ebs morph 0.210 & period ~7.836 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.270; flat LCs with eclipses of ~0.12 & 0.02 mag (secondary total); discontinuities in S87;
0037606218.notes: discontinuities in S87 may be handled by detrending; shallowness of secondary mitigated by being total; in the 2021ApJ...912..123J catalogue;

0055497281.details: 41 short cadence sectors; tess-ebs morph 0.070 & period ~14.905 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.989; aka AL Dor; SpT F8V; in debcat; eclipses of ~0.5 & ~0.4 mag;
0055497281.notes: in debcat & already well characterised - may exclude; some potential L3 sources but at least 5 mag fainter; analysis based on cleanest contiguous pairs from across the TESS sectors;

0055659311.details: 26 short cadence sectors (1-2, 4-12, 61-65, 67-69, 87-90, 94-96); tess-ebs morph 0.049 & period ~31.113 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe -- with no parallax given; dist from Gaia DR2 ~500 pc; eclipses of ~0.25 & ~0.24 mag;
0055659311.notes: analysis on best contiguous sectors from across the range of obs; quit a fussy fit, with some warnings - needs more  work

0063192395.details: 3 short cadence sectors (6, 7 & 87); tess-ebs morph 0.528 & period ~3.065 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.259; eclipses of ~0.33 & ~0.30 mag; some ellipsoidal effect; eclipses have shifted phase by +0.05 by sector 87;
0063192395.notes: in TBOSB with per=3.065064 d; despite high morph all 3 sectors fit easily and are reasonably consistent; some crowding in view;

0063579446.details: 2 short cadence sectors (7 & 87); tess-ebs morph 0.382 & period ~5.583 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.003; sector 87 heavily distorted; eclipses of ~0.35 & ~0.30 mag; secondary may be total; some slow variability;

0066602813.details: 6 short cadence sectors (7, 33-34, 61, 87-88); tess-ebs morph 0.352 & period ~2.764 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.985; eclipses of ~0.6 & ~0.2 mag; slow variability - starspot?;
0066602813.notes: consistent results from fitting all sectors independently;

0077158150.details: 2 short cadence sectors (4 & 5); tess-ebs morph 0.466 & period ~2.487 d; not found in Gaia DR3; aka RZ Cae; eclipses of ~0.25 & ~0.15 mag; slight ellipsoidal effect; distorted region in S4;
0077158150.notes: not found in DR3 so need to source distance elsewhere;

0078568736.details: 3 short cadence sectors (6-7 & 33); tess-ebs morph 0.159 & period ~8.220 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.738; SpT G; eclipses of ~0.60 & ~0.12 mag; slow variability;
0078568736.notes: using flattening to remove variability on well detached system;

0080556181.details: 2 short cadence sectors (7 & 87); tess-ebs morph 0.481 & period ~2.820 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.705; eclipses of ~0.40 & ~0.26 mag; secondary eclipse may be total; eclipses show a phase shift of approximately -0.04 between the sectors;
0080556181.notes: S7 is an easy fit & no MC errors

0080650858.details: 4 short cadence sectors (7, 8, 61 & 62); tess-ebs morph 0.517 & period ~1.916 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.963; aka BH Pup; SpT B3/5III; eclipses of ~0.32 & ~0.10 mag; some variability; S8 heavily distorted after mid-sector break; secondary eclipse may be total;

0118313102.details: 8 short cadence sectors (8-10, 35, 36, 61-63); tess-ebs morph 0.180 & period ~9.256 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.962; aka NT Vel; SpT B6V(n); deep eclipses of ~0.69 & ~0.66 mag; clear pulsations; S8 distorted after mid-sector break;

0140209204.details: 1 short cadence sector (5); tess-ebs morph 0.528 & period ~2.752 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.868; aka SV Col; deep eclipses of ~0.46 & ~0.44 mag; ellipsoidal effect;

0140659978.details: 33 short cadence sectors (5-8,27-33,35-39,61-69,87-90,93-96); tess-ebs morph 0.090 & period ~9.440 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.830; eclipses of ~0.15 & ~0.08 mag; variability (starspots?);
0140659978.notes: likely need flattening to deal with out of eclipse variability

0141685465.details: 26 short cadence sectors (4-13, 61-65, 67-69, 87-90, 93-96); tess-ebs morph 0.220 & period ~7.807 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.882; flat LCs with eclipses of ~0.28 & ~0.06 mag;

0147975720.details: 2 short cadence sectors (6 & 7); tess-ebs morph 0.179 & period ~2.850 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 19.278; eclipses of ~0.3 mag; slow variability; flares;
0147975720.notes: no secondary visible with tess-ebs period;

0149629043.details: 15 short cadence sectors (9-13, 61, 62, 64, 65, 67, 69, 87-89, 94, 96); tess-ebs morph 0.455 & period ~2.188 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.177; eclipses of ~0.35 & ~0.33 mag;
0149629043.notes: noticable variation in eclipse depths between sectors - L3?

0150361911.details: 16 short cadence sectors (9-13, 62-68, 87, 89, 90, 94, 95); tess-ebs morph 0.461 & period ~2.494 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.937;eclipses of ~0.25 & ~0. mag;
0150361911.notes: some variation in eclipse depths between sectors - L3?;eclipses shift phase by ~0.03 between early & late sectors

0153709888.details: 2 short cadence sectors (4 & 5); tess-ebs morph 0.391 & period ~2.166 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.938; eclipses of ~0.08 mag; slight variation between sectors;
0153709888.notes: double tess-ebs period; better fit found by combining the sectors; standard fit finds L3 approx -0.3;

0160328766.details: 4 short cadence sectors (6, 32, 33 & 87); tess-ebs morph 0.199 & period ~10.318 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.148; aka AW Col; SpT A3(m)A7-A7; eclipses of ~0.50 & ~0.15 mag; all sectors have at least 1 of each eclipse type;
0160328766.notes: well detached and highly eccentric; fix reflA/B to avoid warnings;

0167304040.details: 20 short cadence sectors (9-13, 61-67, 69, 87-89, 93-96); tess-ebs morph 0.346 & period ~5.819 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.123; eclipses of ~0.24 & ~0.22 mag;
0167304040.notes: eccentric with some negatic phase shift on later sectors; trouble fitting S61, however S9, 10, 62 & 63 are consistent;

0167747439.details: 4 short cadence sectors (5, 6, 32, 33); tess-ebs morph 0.462 & period ~6.131 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.052; eclipses of ~0.06 & ~0.01 mag; slight ellipsoidal effect; shallow eclipses mitigated by the secondary being total;
0167747439.notes: uncrowded field so consider fixing L3 at zero;

0167756615.details: 1 short cadence sectors (5); tess-ebs morph 0.159 & period ~19.430 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 2.227; SpT F5V; eclipses of ~0.18 & ~0.13 mag; despite longer period, one of each eclipse type;
0167756615.notes: slightly eccentric; test fits hint at evolved secondary;
